titleStmt.title: A true account from Lisburn in Ireland, of the examination of Robert Burdett painter, Joshua Shanks, Robert Hodscase, seamen; Thomas Gray, shoemaker, Henry Moore and Richard Givart, skinners, and inhabitants of Limerick, who made their escape lately from thence, and give this following account.
titleStmt.author: Burdett, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
